67. The Worst Night of My Life

13 Dec 2020

That was the worst night of my life. Alone on the other side of the globe. Isolated in a cold, closed room. The sweat of nerves and the chill of the air leave me so uncomfortable in the boxy hostel bedroom. I keep my eyes from the shadowy windows. The balcony door creaks open, followed by the kitchen door.
